product.name: Fire Beauty Fireplace Screen 3 Panel Wrought Iron Metal 48"(L) x30(H) Spark Guard Cover(Black)
product.description:
3 panel screen arched top almost matches with your home deco, gas fireplace, fireplace tools, fireplace grate and holders accessories.
Full length piano hinges to block popping embers effectively.Durable screen can completely block popping embers, keep your kids & puppies away from the fireplace & safeguard the living room safety
Keeping the screen looking its best is a breeze, as the easy-to-clean material helps to prevent rust buildup and maintain its appearance.
product.bullet_points:
• CLASSIC TIMELESS DESIGN:3 panel screen arched top almost matches with your home deco, gas fireplace, fireplace tools, fireplace grate and holders accessories.
• SPARK GUARD: Full length piano hinges to block popping embers effectively.Durable screen can completely block popping embers, keep your kids & puppies away from the fireplace & safeguard the living room safety
• OVERALL DIMENSIONS: 48"(L) x 30"(H),black powder-coated finish
• FOLDABLE FIREPLACE SCREEN: This 3 panel screen can be manipulated to your preference for the perfect setup in front of your fireplace and folded down for easy storage in compact spaces.No assembly required.
• EASY TO CLEAN: Keeping the screen looking its best is a breeze, as the easy-to-clean material helps to prevent rust buildup and maintain its appearance.
• DESIGN PATENT: This product has been granted a patent certificate by the United States Patent and Trademark Office.We have invested significant time,effort,and resources into developing this unique product and reserve all legal rights to protect our intellectual property.We caution any potential infringers that unauthorized copying,imitation,or sale of our product will be subject to legal pursuit.
